title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: An error message is thrown when using the specific date value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter.
EB: The filter should accept the date value new Date('3/2/2005') without throwing an error.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the 'value1' field of the filter, input the value new Date('3/2/2005').
